description.value:
You bind dangerous magic into your armor. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with a hostile effect that targets one creature, you store the spell in your armor instead. Your armor can only store one spell in this way; you can't cast activate defense firewall while you are under the effect of activate defense firewall.

When a creature touches or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon, you can Cast the Spell as a reaction, targeting the triggering creature; the triggering creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against this spell. Only the creature who triggered the reaction is affected by the spell.

You can Dismiss active defense firewall. If you do, the prepared spell slot used to cast the spell modified by active defense firewall is recovered, but the spell is not. The empty spell slot can be used to prepare a spell with Download Spell.
